trans-unit.source: Represents a composition during the text input events of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示的文本输入事件期间的撰写<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is a FrameworkTextComposition when the user enters text into a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> by using an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>, or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性时在用户输入到文本是 FrameworkTextComposition<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]和<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>， <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>，或<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>事件发生。</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: FrameworkTextComposition is the base class of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.
trans-unit.target: FrameworkTextComposition 是<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>的基类

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition> class defines properties that return <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> objects to indicate the position of the text composition.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>类定义返回的属性<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer>对象指示的位置将文本撰写。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>

trans-unit.source: When the user enters text into a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.
trans-unit.target: 当用户输入文本<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>，<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName>是一种<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: Finalizes the composition.
trans-unit.target: 完成组合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the current composition in Unicode symbols.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前的组合长度以 Unicode 符号。

trans-unit.source: The CompositionLength property indicates how many characters have been entered since the last <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event.
trans-unit.target: CompositionLength 属性指示上次以来已输入的字符数<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: This property is only meaningful when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 此属性才有意义<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>事件发生。</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs, CompositionLength is –1, and the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> property indicates the length of the composition.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>事件发生，CompositionLength 为&1;，与<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A>属性指示的组合长度。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: CompositionLength is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: CompositionLength 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[版本和依赖关系](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The length of the current composition in Unicode symbols.
trans-unit.target: 在 Unicode 符号当前组合的长度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the position at which the composition text occurs in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取组合文本中出现的位置<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property is only meaningful when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 此属性才有意义<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>事件发生。</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> is –1, and the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A> property indicates the position of the composition text.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>发生事件时，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A>为&1;，与<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A>属性指示撰写文本的位置。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: CompositionOffset is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: CompositionOffset 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[版本和依赖关系](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The position at which the composition text occurs in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 组合文本中出现的位置<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the finalized text in Unicode symbols when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 获取已完成在 Unicode 文本的长度符号时<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>事件发生。</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs, ResultLength is –1.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>事件发生，ResultLength 为 –&1;。</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>

trans-unit.source: ResultLength is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: ResultLength 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[版本和依赖关系](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The length of the finalized text in Unicode symbols when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 已完成在 Unicode 文本的长度符号时<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>事件发生。</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: Gets the offset of the finalized text when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 获取已完成的文本的偏移量时<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>事件发生。</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> is –1.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>发生事件时，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A>为 –&1;。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>

trans-unit.source: ResultOffset is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: ResultOffset 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[版本和依赖关系](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The offset of the finalized text when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 已完成的文本的偏移量时<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>事件发生。</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>
